		                    Stage II Paranasal Sinus and Nasal Cavity Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage II paranasal sinus and nasal cavity cancer depends on where cancer is found in the paranasal sinuses and nasal cavity:         - If cancer is in the maxillary sinus, treatment is usually high-dose radiation therapy before or after surge
